result.title: how to make this problem accepted
result.content:
this code from uri has 20% wrong and i didnt know where is the wrong this is the link of the problem https://www.urionlinejudge.com.br/judge/en/problems/view/1038 and this is my C++ code 

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int Code,Qau;
double F;
int main ()
{
cin >> Code >> Qau;
if (Code==1)
 { F=4.00*Qau;
 cout <<"Total: R$ ";
  printf ("%.2lf\n",F); }

else if (Code==2)
{ F=4.50*Qau;
cout <<"Total: R$ ";
printf ("%.2lf\n",F); }

else if (Code==3)
{ F=5.00*Qau;
cout <<"Total: R$ ";
printf ("%.2lf\n",F); }

else if (Code==4)
{ F=2.00*Qau;
cout <<"Total: R$ ";
printf ("%.2lf\n",F); }

else if (Code==5)
{F=1.50*Qau;
cout <<"Total: R$ ";
("%.2lf",F); 
cout <<endl;} 

return 0;

}
